price: যিজন শক্তিশালী, আৰশ্বৰ মালিকৰ ওচৰত মৰ্যদাসম্পন্ন,
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
